title: Hamadryas argentea
text: Hamadryas argentea (also called Silvery Buttercup) is a species of <a href="plant">plant</a> in the family <a href="Ranunculaceae">Ranunculaceae</a>. It is <a href="Endemism">endemic</a> to <a href="Falkland%20Islands">Falkland Islands</a>. Its natural <a href="habitat">habitat</a>s are temperate <a href="dwarf%20shrub">dwarf shrub</a> <a href="heath">heath</a> and temperate <a href="grassland">grassland</a>.
